XBPS Package Manager

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

Repositories

- List installed repositories: 

$ xbps-query -L

- Install additional repositories: 

# xbps-install void-repo-nonfree void-repo-multilib void-repo-multilib-nonfree [void-repo-debug]
# xbps-install -Su xbps && xbps-install -u

Query

Installed

- List all installed packages: 

$ xbps-query -l

- List manual (non-dependency) installed packages: 

$ xbps-query -m

- List orphaned installed packages: 

$ xbps-query -O

- List on hold (not updated automatically) installed packages: 

$ xbps-query -H

Package

- Put package to hold/unhold mode: 

# xbps-pkgdb -m <hold|unhold> <PACKAGE>

- Show detailed info about package: 

$ xbps-query [-R] -S <PACKAGE>

- Show package(s) that own(s) specific file: 

$ xbps-query [-R ] -o <WILDCARD_STRING>

- Show files owned by package: 

$ xbps-query -[-R] -f <PACKAGE>
